response.job_title: Early-stage researcher | Ph.D. student in Mechanical Engineering | Renewable Energies | Energy technology | Biomass | Biofuels
response.summary:
Mechanical Engineer, looking towards contributing to the reduction of the human-made impact on the environment, and the development of carbon-neutral energy technology solutions, with a focus on renewable energy solutions. 
Excellent at providing technical input in renewable energies and energy technologies, with teamwork skills, leadership initiative, and experience in international environments
- Ph.D. student in Mechanical Engineering, M.Sc. in Sustainable Energies
- Research, Mechanical Engineering, comprehensive understanding of Thermal power engineering, Energy conversion, Renewable energies, Biofuels, Thermochemical conversion of fuels
response.skills: Renewable Energy, Biomass Conversion, Gasification, Energy Efficiency, Energy, Thermodynamics, CAD/CAM Software, Microsoft Office, English as a Second Language (ESL), German, French

profile_positions.description:
Early-Stage Researcher at the Research Group of Sustainable Energy and Fuels.
- Planning, organizing, conducting, and reporting experimental and analysis work on fuels and feedstock
- Conducting laboratory-scale experiments of thermochemical co-pyrolysis of fossil and renewable fuels
- Participate in energy technologies research projects
- Writing and publication of scientific papers, for journals and conference proceedings

Thermochemical conversion of feedstock
- Sample preparation and characterization
- Thermogravimetric Analysis of feedstock (Woody biomass, Oil shale)
- Thermochemical co-pyrolysis of woody biomass and oil shale in a batch reactor
- Analysis of gaseous and liquid products (GC, FTIR, GC-MS, Elemental and proximate analysis)
profile_positions.title: Early-stage researcher

profile_positions.description:
Manufacturing company for the metal industry. Die casting, powder metallurgy, CNC machining.
- B2B technical sales for bespoke metal manufactured parts
- Preparation of sales plans, marketing strategies, and supplier databases
- Trade, negotiations, logistics, project management, and support of sales projects  
- Negotiating tender and contract terms and conditions with clients to optimize costs
- Creating and updating orders and sales, as well as calculating client quotations and administering client accounts in the European Union
- Collaborating with the production, engineering, and procurement departments to meet customer quality needs
- Maintaining customer relations, record communications, and providing after-sales support
profile_positions.title: Foreign Trade Manager

profile_positions.description:
Master Student research member at the Fuel and Air Analysis and Thermal Testing Research Group of the Department of Energy Technology.
- Conducting experimental research on thermochemical conversion processes
- Carrying out experiments of thermochemical gasification of woody biomass in a batch reactor, to determine the potential of local biomass in gasification
- Fine-tuning operational equipment
- Carrying out sample preparation
- Conducting Gas Chromatography  and Fourier Transform Infrared Spectroscopy analysis for syngas and producer gas to measure the gas composition
profile_positions.title: Master Student

profile_positions.description:
Mechanical Engineer at the Renewable Energies and Power Plants Research Group ‘Clean Development Mechanisms and Energy Management. 
- Participate in research projects, planning, executing, and analyzing research on thermochemical conversion of biomass
- Conducting experiments on gasification of biomass residues (coconut pit and bamboo) in a fixed bed gasifier
- Participated in the project commercial validation of functional prototypes for combined heat and power generation plants
- Design and development of a prototype double action steam engine
profile_positions.title: Mechanical Engineer

education.field_of_study: Materials and processes of sustainable energetics
Materials and Processes of Sustainable Energetics
